items.title: Iran’s regime in its ‘final days and weeks' after mass protests, Germany’s Merz says
items.description: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz on Tuesday said the embattled Iranian regime appears to be finished.

items.title: Trump’s tariff gambit over Iran risks derailing U.S.–China trade deal
items.description: President Donald Trump's threat of 25% tariffs on countries doing business with Iran has raised the risk of derailing Washington's fragile trade deal ...

items.title: Powell investigation: Drumbeat of Republican opposition grows on Capitol Hill
items.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he was under investigation on Sunday night, the latest episode in President Donald Trump's feud with him.

items.title: Trump says any country doing business with Iran will face 25% U.S. tariff
items.description: Trump's tariff post targeting Iran comes as the oil-rich country struggles to suppress an ongoing swell of massive anti-government protests.

items.title: Sen. Kelly sues DOD Sec. Hegseth, says he was punished for 'disfavored political speech'
items.description: Hegseth said the Pentagon would cut Kelly's military retirement pay over his participation in a video telling U.S. troops they can refuse unlawful ord...
